name: Ibiograph
tag_list: mobile, applications, android, ebooks, context-aware, personal-search, memory, photos
description: A context-aware memory agent for mobiles
overview:
A context-aware memory agent for mobiles; Ibiograph saves, organizes, remembers, and publishes individual’s memories.

Ibiograph saves daily events as they happen, brings back memories connected to a person’s current status right on the homescreen of their mobile, and organizes and publishes moments from a person’s life into meaningful, narrative eBooks complete with indexes and maps.

Ibiograph documents, organizes, and publishes the life people live. A memory application, Ibiograph saves and structures memories and presents them in narrative, published forms. Ibiograph makes people’s memories search-able by location, people, time, activities, feelings, objects, and themes.

Ibiograph is a next generation mobile application. Next-gen mobile apps are agents that deliver integrated services in anticipation of a user’s needs.

Memory App Ibio automatically saves, tags, organizes, indexes, and syncs backups of your memories into the cloud. Access your memories anytime, anywhere from any web-enabled device.

Memory Feed Widget Ibio’s MemoryFeed widget streams forgotten moments onto your home screen based on connections to your location, time of day, who you’re with, and what you are doing.

Ibio eBooks Besides saving and organizing memories, people need an intuitive, enjoyable way to experience their memories. Ibiograph brings to eBooks personal, user-generated content. Enjoy your own life story alongside the latest bestsellers and the classics.

milestones.description: Launched free, ad-supported version of Memory App in the Android market
Free and Premium versions of Ibio Memory App for Android now available in Android Market
Ibiograph Memory App has been approved to be in the Amazon App Store
